product_name: SUP Buddy Water Bottle Holder - Purple
long_description: A removable coozie for cans and bottles, the purple SUP Buddy Water Bottle Holder has suction cups and rip-and-stick straps so you can mount it to your stand up paddleboard, kayak or canoe. Includes mesh bag to hold onto small items like car keys and sunblock. Coozie fits most can and bottle sizes. Easy installation and removal.
short_description: A removable coozie for cans and bottles, the purple SUP Buddy Water Bottle Holder has suction cups and rip-and-stick straps so you can mount it to your stand up paddleboard, kayak or canoe.
